result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael J Kaske

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Michael J Kaske in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Michele W. Hulgaard appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State moves to dismiss and read-in. Court grants and the matter is dismissed and read-in.

Defendant Michael J Kaske in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel is requesting adjournment so his client can pay the restitution and attend AODA treatment. State has no objections. Court grants.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 8, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Michael J Kaske in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel is requesting a new date to give the defendant time to pay the restitution and do his AODA treatment. State has no objections. Court grants.  Hearing scheduled for October 30, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 14, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Michael J Kaske in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel is requesting adjournment. State has no objections. Court grants.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 14, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 17, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Jorge R Fragoso in court.   Defendant Michael J Kaske did not appear.   Barbara A. Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney appears by authorization  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 17, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Michael J Kaske in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Discovery provided by the State.
  Hearing scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness/business listed in the Criminal Complaint.

Defendant Michael J Kaske in court.  Timothy F. Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsi  Court advises of right to an attorney.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 09:00 am.
